title: Epilogue to the French midwife's tragedy who was burnt in Leicester-Fields, March 2, 1687/8, for the barbarous murder of  her husband Denis Hobry / this may be printed, R.P.
author: Settle, Elkanah, 1648-1724.
notes: Attributed to Elkanah Settle by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
